id.description: The id of the input. One is generated if not supplied.

interaction.description:
Specifies if interaction with the input is enabled, disabled, or readonly.
When "disabled", the input changes visibly to indicate that it cannot
receive user interactions. When "readonly" the input still cannot receive
user interactions but it keeps the same styles as if it were enabled.

placeholder.description:
Html placeholder text to display when the input has no value. This
should be hint text, not a label replacement.

isRequired.description: Whether or not the text input is required.

showArrows.description: Whether or not to display the up/down arrow buttons.

value.description: The value of the input (should be accompanied by an `onChange` prop).

display.description: The display of the root element.

inputRef.description: A function that provides a reference to the actual input element.

onFocus.description: Callback fired when input receives focus.

onBlur.description: Callback fired when the input loses focus.

onDecrement.description:
Called when the down arrow button is clicked, or the down arrow key is
pressed.

onIncrement.description:
Called when the up arrow button is clicked, or the up arrow key is
pressed.

onKeyDown.description: Callback fired when a key is pressed.

inputMode.description: The inputMode attribute of the underlying `input` element can be one of ['numeric', 'decimal', 'tel']

textAlign.description: The text alignment of the input.

allowStringValue.description: sets the input type to string and allows string as value

renderIcons.description: Sets the icons to be rendered for increase and decrease buttons

margin.description: Margin around the component. Accepts a `Spacing` token. See token values and example usage in [this guide](https://instructure.design/#layout-spacing).
